explicit.rewards

Interface MDPRewards

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Rewards
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    STPGRewards
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MDPRewardsSimple, StateRewards, StateRewardsArray, StateRewardsConstant, StateRewardsSimple, STPGRewardsSimple

    public interface MDPRewards
extends Rewards
    Classes that provide (read) access to explicit-state rewards for an MDP.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getStateReward(int s)
      Get the state reward for state s.
      double getTransitionReward(int s, int i)
      Get the transition reward for the ith choice from state s.
      boolean hasTransitionRewards()
      Returns true if this reward structure has transition rewards
      MDPRewards liftFromModel(Product<? extends Model> product)
      Create a new reward structure that lifts this one such that it is defined over states of a model that is a product of the one that this reward structure is defined over.
